content.detailedDescription:
I went food shoping just to pick up a couple of things (shoprite) my daughter was in the back she is 4. i was driving towards my home near the river and i just saw this big ,not to me because it was far away but i can see a big circle that was just stationary facing south it was like over silver it was almost white but was silver and the sun was refelective on it at the top was a redish orange color hard to tell because of the sun.The thing that was strange there were no planes in the area i mean i look up all the time and there are always some planes flying by. but the sky was empty i had to make a left towards my house and looked up the sky was empty if it was a plane on a clear day i would still be able to see it going in some sort of direction it was gone.I would say it was about 10 miles south of me.I have never seen a ufo before but have been intrested in the subject for quite some time .My wifes cousin son saw one when i went to pick him up from a teen party he saw 3 red lights moving very fast we were on a bridge driving over water but it was the same area about a year ago i did not see them because i was driving. again the thing that was most strange there were no planes in the area  espically for a saturday but there were none for like 1 hour in the area,also the entire sighting took place in about 30 to forty second but i know what i saw .

i was driving south on fisher blvd
i do not know what it was but it looked like if you took a blimp and looked at it from the front only with no scck-pit and left it stationary.
it was just motionless
my feeling were i was pissed because there was a car behind me and i could not pull over.
i lost sight because i had to make a left turn.As soon as i could stop i did and it was gone.
the direction i was driving in you can almost see it in plain sight and then look a little up.
content.summary: Silver circle like almost white with not moving then just gone

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from college on state road 52, just west of i-75, around 7:10 local time, i observed a disc shaped object approximately 15 degrees above the horizon due west, it appeared stationary, but it was tilted at a 45 degree angle, the northern side higher then the southern side. the sky was clear, the sun was setting but it was not yet dark enough to see even the brightest stars. the object was highly reflective, like light shining off polished metal or a mirror. the color, shape, and size of the object rules out anything that we "officially" know of as humans. it was far off in the distance, not close enough to be designated at a close encounter of the first kind, but i deffinately know what i saw, i observed the object for 1-2 minutes. i was completely transfixed on it, i up untill this event i was one of people that said, "why didnt they grab a camera and take a picture?" i had my cell phone with a camera in the seat next to me, while observing the object, taking a picture was the last thing i thought of. i've always believe in ufo's and aliens, but i've never seen anything personally untill today, i felt and reacted with an "i knew it", the reaction you get when you discover something you suspected, but could never prove untill that point. i lost sight of the object when i swerved to avoid rear ending a car that i only saw at the last second because i had been staring at the object and not the road. in the process of avoiding a collision, i slamed on the brakes and swerved to the right off the road, getting a flat tire in the process. when i revovered from my near accident, and looked up for the object again, it was gone.
content.summary: Disc shaped object tilted at a 45 degree angle, 15 degrees above the horizon, due west on sr-52

content.detailedDescription: I finished a route in fairfield and was returning to corsicana. i was between streetman and richland on i-45 heading northwest. it was a clear blue sky with no clouds in sight and tempature about 80. out of the passenger side windshield i noticed a bright white object to the north. it appeared to be about the size of a small private jet but at a lower altitude than private plane would fly. a lot lower than any commercial liner would fly. it caught my eye because there is not much air traffic visible during the day. there didn't appear to be any wings,rudder,fuselage,etc. the best description i can give for the shape is the classic "disc" shape. it looked like an upside down pie pan. no lights or markings just a very, very bright glowing white "disc". the object appeared to be heading west by northwest. almost parallel with the freeway but a little more in a westernly direction crossing i-45. from the time i noticed it till it vanished in the distance to the west was approximately 7-8 seconds. this object was traveling at an extremely high rate of speed. no smoke, exhaust or vapor trail of any kind followed behind the object.
content.summary: Saw a ufo heading west

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home with my girlfriend at around 8-9 pm when i looked up and noticed the light. i live near an airport and, frequently, see planes and other aircraft in the skies around me but this looked different. this appeared as just an orange-ish, spherical light. it was moving very very slowly across the sky above us. there were also very brief moments where it's speed would grow tremendously, moving in just a second , seemingly, as far as it had in the previous 10 . we,initially, saw the object while heading south and then turned and followed it for about 1 mile to the east, another 2-3 miles north, and then 2 more miles to the east again. people see lights all the time and i understand that. but what made this event different to me were two main things. a few minutes after we saw the light, we saw a black helicopter seemingly following it in the same direction. we then saw another, and another, until finally there were about 7-8 of these black helicopters following the orange light gaining ground as it went slowly and losing it after the light sped up and so on. the path all the craft were taking took us down a road east, as i mentioned, and we gave the chase up once we came to an area of the road which was blocked off by numerous police cars with their lights flashing. we drove around the area a bit and saw that other points around this large neighborhood area were blocked by lit up police cars. i'm a professional firefighter and a paramedic and i have been on a lot of scenes and calls where police are looking for someone and have an area closed off like this but i have never seen this many police cars used for such a purpose. it certainly could have been just the police searching for someone, but the fact that the area was much larger then i have seen in that situation, and the number of police in the area(probably at least 20 police cars) add that to the fact that this neighborhood was under the path and around the point where we lost sight of the lights and helicopters and the, ever infamous, black helicopters made this event stick out in my mind and help me decide to share this story.
content.summary: Orange light traveling very slowly followed by 7-8 dark helicoptors.

content.detailedDescription: Was talking to my daughter on the phone about seven thirty p m when i looked out my bedroom window and saw two objects in the sky that were as bright as stars like a silver color but much lower than a star one was slightly higher than the other and both were round shaped after about twenty seconds one disapeared into thin air and two seconds later the other disappeared and never came back very strange
content.summary: Looking out bedroom window saw two very bright objects in the sky like stars

content.detailedDescription: Fireworks were being lit, but sighting occured during very brief pause in display. 3 red orbs appeared just over tree line, cruising in unison, perfectly parallel together & very fast and disappeared on the horizon. after that, and a split second behind them, 2 more appeared over the trees and disappeared on the horizon. i could not see inside orbs, they strobed darker red to lighter red. they made only a slight swoosh when they moved thru air over our heads and disappeared over the horizon. they travelled very fast and did not slow as they passed over us. sighting lasted 3 to 5 sec. possibly. i heard an older woman say those were'nt part of the fireworks. i knew i saw a unidentifiable flying object immediately, i believe they were trying to blend in with all the fireworks, but they were clearly very high tech and did not behave like fireworks would have! i asked others if they saw what i just saw. others there saw it also, but maybe did not have as clear of a view as i did, or they maybe could not process what they had seen. was seen by my wife and daughter and a few others there to celebrate the 4th. i have searched internet to see if such a thing was seen by others that evening or pictures, no info though.
content.summary: 3 red orbs seen travelling very fast in parallel lines,  then 2 more behind them dissapearing on the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Video taken october 4th 2010 and posted on youtube here: *link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg.

on september 29th at 1am montreal suburb cote saint luc residents reported seeing a ufo hovering over the cavendish mall. on october 2nd at around 9:30 pm i was putting my son to bed and felt compelled to look out my bedroom window. right away i noticed an abnormally bright "star" that i had never seen there before to my knowledge. it hung in the sky at what looked like double the altitude the planes were flying at. i live close to dorval airport and there is an aerial landing path on either side of my house. plenty of planes fly by constantly. the star-like object captivated my attention. my son got out of bed and we both spent a good forty minutes watching it move across the sky slowly in a southern direction and an upward trajectory. it was moving slowly away from us. 
the strangest thing it did was it moved in reaction to a plane that was flying somewhat close to it, it moved up and away, also south really quickly compared to its other movement. otherwise it's movements seemed to be hovering and gliding over. i noted its position in the sky before i went to sleep at midnight. 
on october 3rd the same object became visible as i was walking my dog with my son at 7:30pm. in an effort to distinguish this light from the stars, i actually noticed another similar strange light object. i pointed to what i assumed was a bright star, (had we been inside i would have only seen this from the front balcony) and said ���see there that is a star.��� except upon closer inspection it was much like the other light, but farther away and it too was moving. it appeared to be a 2nd identical intense bright ball of light hovering in the sky. that 2nd light moved across the sky rather quickly, i kept checking on it and it moved in a northeastern direction but maintained a very high altitude. again i noted its position in the sky before i went to sleep at midnight.

on october 4th i was ready to video the object, worried it wouldn���t come back or not be visible because of the cloudy weather conditions but sure enough at 8:30 pm it was back in its regular spot, and i had my tripod and hd camera pointed at the sky outside my back balcony. 
the video shows the object, which is essentially a ball of intense light. it looks to me like it could be rotating. the object is white light and the light radiating off the edges changes from bluish-purple to green.
my boyfriend witnessed this light with me and agreed it was very strange, saw that it moved positions and couldn���t be a star, satellite, plane or spotlight. it appeared to be hovering in space just beyond our atmosphere. we woke up at 4:52 am on october 5th as the sky was beginning to brighten and looked out the bedroom window, same view as the back balcony, the light/object was still there except it was much closer and lower in the sky. i wasn���t able to record it, technical issues to due clouds and light, impatient to get back to sleep and overtired.
also i wasn���t able to video the 2nd light/object last night. not sure it was the same 2nd object i saw the night before. it looked like it might be, it was in the same spot as the night before but the cloudy conditions and the distance made it impossible to videotape. 
i���ve been scouring the internet for similar reports and notice lots of similar images out there.
content.summary: Video of intense bright ufo light orb hovering and moving across montreal sky on evenings of oct 2, 3 and 4th 2010 visible all night, near dorval airport.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home after dark with my then 5 year old son, i am told by my now grown son that i pulled over and told him to get out of the car and look up, we did and he remembers seeing a hugh circle of rotating lights above us, no sound just hovering. he said there was someone pulled over behind us. then suddenly the craft shot up and was gone. the only thing i remember is pulling over. i cannot remember the craft or the people behind us. 

years later i was hiking near a large lake (daytime) when i heard a sound above me, in my mind before looking up i pictured something as large or larger than a football field ( the sounds was just so powerful), needless to say i was frightened to actually look, but even so i did and to my amazement there was nothing there physically, but the sound was there and i could hear it slowly move off to my right over the lake then it was gone.
content.summary: Circle of lights    invisible sound

content.detailedDescription: At approximatley 9:30pm on a sunday evening walking the dogs, a very bright object approached straight from the east heading west over plainfield at about 4000 ft above 135th st on the northwest side. the objects's shape could not be discerned due to the extreme brightness. the light was so intense that no other navigational lights were seen and a halo-like appearance radiated outward from the object in a 360 degree fashion. the amber-like color was exactly that of the ubiquitous street lamps. there was no noise similar to that of a passenger jetliner or helicopter coming from this craft. the craft was travelling a speed typical of an airliner approaching one of chicago's airports.  however, the route it was flying was exactly opposite of the route of jet airliners on approach to midway airport which is a straight eastbound approach over this area.  the object then turned ninety degrees to due south when it finally reached my position in the neighborhood.  what was odd was that the intensity diminished greatly but the same color was seen from behind but in the shape of a small rectangle reducing in size as it moved away which disappeared in a few seconds ( maybe 5-6 seconds ) as if it went into some sort of hyperdrive. no white, green, nor red navigational lights were seen when the object was moving away.
content.summary: Bright amber colored aircraft at night

content.detailedDescription: Husband called we ourside where he was walking my grandson in the yard and pointed up into the sky, bright blue a few scattering of clouds coming from the northeast. "what in the world is going on ?" he asked pointing out serveral cigar things high up in the sky flying fast to the southeast he said i have seen several of these things one after the other going both direction even crisscrossing each other then there was a helicropter way up high following m just then i saw on coming from the north west  going southeast quickly followed by a second one higher up then one coming in the opposite direction  no vaper trails at all and no noise then a jet at a much lower level only it was white. i have never seen a military type jet that was white came over going west. then two more of these things high up going east. its looks like a highway at rush hour up there what is going on. i'm going back outside to watch some more and see if i can get a picture.
content.summary: Like a cigar or tube no visible wings

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend at he time and i were living in a friend's tiny fifth-wheel trailer on a hilltop in daly city, california.  it was directly in the flight path of san francisco international airport; we were watching "cops" on tv, and [name removed/dr/cms] had passed out after dinner and a few beers.  i remember watching this particular episode with a growing feeling of dread.  a swat team was preparing to bust a major drug dealer, and i was suddenly overcome with a terrible premonition that i was watching a destiny that might well be ours if i didn't act to prevent it soon.  i had no idea why, or what, or even when--so i did what i always do when i get scared and don't know what to do--i prayed, saying the lord's prayer, pleading with him to save us, to give us a reason to persevere, motivation to stay together and try to make things work. i remember practically begging jesus to return for us.

i worked on the flightline for six years while in the air force, so i am quite familiar with the sounds planes make when they fly overhead, and the doppler effect on sound as it moves.  and that's why i found it a bit strange when an aircraft flew directly overhead--and stopped, hovering over the trailer, shaking the thing like a giant rattling maracas. it was very loud, and sounded very powerful, because even the loudest of airplanes din't come close, and in any event nothing that powerful can hover this lasted for roughly ten minutes, then the sound and rattling faded.  minutes later, the exact same thing happened, and repeated twice more for a total of four times.  a few months later, i learned that i was pregnant, and had conceived in that time frame.

why is this incident remarkable? i wouldn't have even given it a second thought, except for [name removed/dr/cms] history, and mine.  his uncle was working on roswell afb the day that ship crashed, and what he saw he refused to tell anyone until a few years ago when hr did an interview for a ufo documentary that aired on the science channel in 2007.  and when i was three, my dad took me to a clearing in the woods next to our home on millstream road in woodstock, new york, in the spring or summer of 1971.  i was terrified of the big gray "hippopotamus", but my dad wanted me to not be scared, to believe it would be ok.  

also, [name removed/dr/cms] was born in roswell; his birth certificate states [birth date removed/dr/cms].  he was in the army, and before we met for the first time in 2003, i believe we'd never met.  our paths, however, had crossed many times.  and my son, in an ultrasound picture of his fou month fetus, he is sitting cross legged with wide eyes looking right into the camera, and i kid you noy looks for all the world like one of the small, large-eyed aliens like we often see in sketches, as if he wants to know who's pering in at him
content.summary: Possible interdimensional transport

content.detailedDescription: I usually go out into the garden at night to study the stars, i have seen these before and really didn't know where or to report my sightings, but then came across your site on a documentary i was watching. i was in the garden about 10pm i stay out for roughly two hours sometimes just popping in to make myself a cup of coffee. i saw like a star but was moving at a steady pace i usually see quite a few nearly every night, at first i thought they could be satellites but then i noticed one seem to manoeuvre around a star. but it didn't seem as high as the stars, it was definitely in or just above our atmosphere. they don't flash or have any beacons they shine just like a star, they also seem at a steady speed but sometimes slow almost a halt and then speed up again?? i'm really baffled on this and could do with some help understanding what this could be, this is not a hoax as you are very welcome to come and see for yourself. i have also shown members of my family these as well. many thanks *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Like moving stars

content.detailedDescription: I came outside during a break at work, as i walked out i looked to the east, i was actually looking at venus i believe, but something didnt look right. in between venus and another bright star to the left of venus, i seen a third bright light in between them. then i noticed that it was moving in a north easterly direction. it moved slowly and after i would say 3 to 4 mins, it just vanished. this was a bright white light, not an aircraft. a few min. later i was still watching the sky, and as i looked to the north, i seen another bright light. this one was more intense, and was moving much faster. it was headed in a easterly direction. i watched it as long as i could until i had to go back to work. it was still headed in the same direction as i went back inside. i couldnt believe what i was seeing. im a skeptic untill proof is in my face, and this sighting really spooked me. i really believe what i saw was not an aircraft, shooting star, ect.. this was different than anything i have ever seen. i tried to take pics with my camera phone, but could not get it to focus, all i could see was black.
content.summary: I seen 2 ufo's while looking to the south east and one to the north east

content.detailedDescription: I parked my car, headed west, into my driveway. i had just got off shift from work. i got out and immediately noticed 2 bright objects in the southwestern sky. at first i thought they might have been planets that i had not noticed on previous mornings.The sun had not yet risen. the objects were running side by side, with one higher than the other. they were moving at a noticeable rate from the southwest to the northeast. they appeared to be as bright as any of the stars in the morning sky, with they same color. i saw no twinkling or color variations. i watched as these objects moved rapidly northeast,(they were moving as fast as i have watched satellites cross the sky) when suddenly one went left and one went right from my standpoint and seemed to disappear straight up within 4 to 5 seconds. i wss very puzzled because i had never seen anything move like these objects did. no sounds or vapor trails were heard or seen. the sky was perfectly clear, no wind, and the outside temperature was 42.4 degrees.
content.summary: 2 bright star like objects moving southwest to northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a little fuzzy on the time frame as the event occurred so many years ago. first i want to say that i was a flight attendent for a major carrier. my date of hire was in 1964 so at that time i had 13 to 15 years experience being around and flying on many kinds of aircraft. i think that i'm qualified to make the determination as to what a conventional aircraft would look and perform like.
the time frame was between 1977 and 1979. i was driving west on i-10 between el paso and tucson. i believe this was between lordsburg, nm and wilcox, az. to the north, or right of my car, i saw an object flying parallel to the freeway which was going appox. 90 mph. it was about 1/3 to 1/2 mile off the freeway with an altitude of appox. one thousand feet.It was twilight. the sun had already set but there was still enough light to discern the chevron shape of the craft. when i arrived at my families' home in tucson, i described it as a flying wing. there was no fuselage, engines or noise. there were 5 or 6 lights on the underside of the aircraft. i picked up my speed but it slowly pulled away from me. i eventually stopped on the side of the road and got out so that i could see it without looking through the windshield. 
i attributed it to military inasmuch as white sands and biggs in el paso were east, sierra vista to the south and davis monthan afb was in tucson. it puzzled me why they would fly such a top secret aircraft along such a busy highway with such a high probability of detection. 
on june 18, 1997, usa today ran a story about the same thing seen by so many people in phoenix, az. i kept the article all these years because it validated what i had seen 18 to 20 years before. the article has an image of the craft, however; the object i saw had a more open wingspan. it occurred to me that maybe the nose had a pivot point where the wings could be adjusted in or out.
this is the first report that i have made on my sighting. i retired after flying for 44 years and this object still perplexes me as it was like nothing i have seen before or since.
content.summary: In 1977, 78 or 79, while driving to from el paso to tucson along interstate 10. i saw a chevron shaped craft with 5 to 6 lights on the underside. it was traveling appox. 90 mph and about 1/2 mile to the north and parallel to the freeway

content.detailedDescription: I was in my office when i received a call from my former neighbor. as i was on the phone with him, i looked out of my office window which faces to the se and i noticed a triangular object which seemed to be rotating horizontally. dulles airport is near by so i am uses to seeing lights in the sky constantly. i immediately noticed this as a unique event not only because of the size of the craft, but because as the object rotated the lights kept there respective geographical shape. this was not three planes buzzing by each other by any means. the lights neither blinked nor changed color, and the lights of the craft were a bright red. i could not make out the lines of the ship because it was too dark but by the shape of the lights again, my obvious inclination was that the craft was a triangular shape. this whole encounter lasted about 15 seconds until i ran outside to get a better look but by then the ufo was gone. there was a large cloud front that rolled in and about five later when the clouds moved by i kept a look out but there was nothing to be seen. i always keep my head to the sky and when i saw this object there was no doubt in my mind what it was, a genuine ufo sighting.
content.summary: Triangle shape ufo highlighted by three red lights on each tip

content.detailedDescription:
I live about a mile north of the end of the airport runway in angel fire, nm. angel fire is in a valley at an elevation of 8,400 ft surrounded by mountains of roughly 10,000 ft to the east and 13,300 feet to the west.

just before 9 pm on august 26 i heard and felt a window-rattling noise, which caused me to go outside to investigate. once outside, i looked up and saw a large helicopter (with bright exterior lights and dim interior lights, noise, spinning rotors) traveling slowly in a northward direction a few hundred feet above hwy 64. immediately in front of the helicopter was an object approximately four times as long as the helicopter. the object was bullet-shaped on both ends and cylindrical between the bullet-shaped ends. the object had no lights, no wings, no markings or windows that i could see, and made no sound. it blocked out the stars behind it. i was able to discern its shape by the shape of the area of blocked-out stars and by the moonlight which illuminated its underside.

the night was clear, with no clouds and easily-distinguishable stars. the moon (just a couple of days past full) was rising over the mountains to the east at the time i saw the object. 

it appeared to me that the object was being "escorted" by the helicopter behind it. both the helicopter and the object moved at a steady, but slow, pace. the unknown object traveled steadily with no wobble or other movement. i watched the helicopter and the unknown object for about three minutes until they disappeared over the horizon. (the helicopter lights were visible for about three minutes ��� the object in front of the helicopter became unseeable after about a minute and a half.)

my feelings? incredulity! curiosity! why was a large ufo flying so low and why was a large helicopter 'assisting' it?
content.summary: Large craft with no lights, no wings, no sound "escorted by large helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I first reported this incident here at:

*link moved to additional evidence section below -- cms/sg.

instead of just copying and pasting what i wrote before i'm going to try to remember again from my memory best i can.  

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?  i was with my girl friend in my ford expedition.  we were leaving our house in lake las vegas traveling southwest on lake mead drive about a mile from the entrance of lake las vegas.  i was traveling about 50 mph at the time.  we were going to eat at fiesta casino in henderson.  immediately after the incident occurred i looked at the clock in the car and on my blackberry.  both said 8:03 pm.  

2. what made you first notice the object?  i was looking at my girl friend who was sitting in the passenger side and i started to notice the ambient light above the car go from darker shadows to lighter shadows fairly quickly while we were driving, i remember thinking to myself what the hell are those shadows.  as soon as i thought that in my head, i started seeing these bright neon green orbs flying around the inside of the car.  

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.  the best way i can describe those lights was that they seemed like the size of tennis balls or ping pong balls, its hard to tell because it was like a light source but they seemed to be flying around in the car.  i was looking at my girlfriend in the passenger seat so i could see the rear of the car with my peripheral and it looked like the lights were dancing around in the back too.  i specifically remember the lights passing over the tops of my thighs and the center console of the expedition.  it almost felt like it was scanning the car.  the green lights moved quickly, so fast they left those lit up optical traces you see when a light moves fast in the dark.  the color of the lights was a deep green type of light.  almost like the green light of a stop light but much a much richer and deep green.  this whole incident maybe lasted 2 seconds.  i honestly can't say if i remember seeing the lights on the outside of the car.  because the lights were moving so fast and were inside the car my head was concentrated at looking inside i forgot to notice if the lights were outside.  my girlfriend says she saw the lights from outside but she's not too sure.  her perspective of it was she was looking through the side view mirror and she said she could see the lights dancing all around the inside of the car.  a part of me wants to say i saw some lights in a light purplish color but this may have been an optical illusion at the way the lights were flying around.  but me and my girlfriend both agree that we did see deep green lights.  the lights were bright, like i was staring into a neon sign but it didn't seem to bathe the car in that green light.  i mean the car was lit up but it didn't seem to paint the inside of the car a specific color but it was hard to tell.  as soon as the lights came they just all shut off and it was gone.  the reminds me, the way the lights first happened it wasn't like just 1 or 2 and slowly more.  it was right away a lot of lights and very fast movement, then gone, it was back to darkness.  after the incident i slowed down hard on the breaks and yelled "what the hell was that".  i immediate looked over head but saw nothing.  

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.  when the lights first turned on in the car i immediate thought it was a toy or some kind of electronic had turned on in the back of the expedition.  but when i started to notice the lights shining and dancing around i knew it wasn't a toy and i got goose bumps all over my body.  i slowed down and went to the next place where i could make a u-turn and wanted to turn around to see what it was.  my girlfriend said she was scared and freaked out and just wanted to get out of there.  we went to fiesta henderson and ate and saw nothing else.
content.summary: Green fast moving orbs in car

content.detailedDescription: On september the 8th 2010 at approx 18:30hrs, i arrived to my gym in a shopping mall via my bike in the area of 24th and oregon in south philadelphia. upon leaving the gym for the evening i usually fix my protein drink and shake it while walking to my bike and finally take big gulps. i was never prepared for what i was going to see but i always hoped for as a young kid that i could very well see a ufo and be able to record every movement of the object. upon arriving to my bike while drinking and my head tilted to the sky i noticed a silver oval like object moving real slow with silence near a pet-smart store at approx 19:44hrs. i then wondered is this what i think it is because it does not have any lights like an airplane and it was not leaving any air dust like jets do. i then thought maybe a weather balloon but it couldn't be because the movement looked completely different. i immediately pulled out my 4th generation iphone and started recording and noticed no one else was looking at what i was looking so i felt weird but i didn't care because this is the moment i have been waiting for. i then saw it leaving my view and proceeded to my bike to follow the object. while on my bike i then noticed two objects flying parallel to each other in some formation that would cause a regular airplane a accident. i got off my bike shocked and tried to focus for my second recording of the now second object in visual but they were to fast and left with such speed out of this world! i immediately text my wife and told her "you will not believe what i just recorded". upon arriving home i screamed for my wife and said please look at this and tell me what you think? she said is this what i think it is i then said maybe but i got to analyze and zoom into the recording for further details. i then proceeded to my computer and went to work and took some still shots of the recording and noticed i had two ufo's in sight. i started zooming into the actual recording while the object was moving and saw the actual shape of this object. i was never more in shock ever in my life until i saw this. i was more in shock for joy then anything over what i had just seen! my conclusion of these two objects can only be classified as my first kind philadelphia ufo.
content.summary: When getting ready to ride my bike i noticed two still oval shape objects in the sky flying real slow with no sound from it.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1:05am on the 4th of october 2010 when i had my third close encounter of the second kind. 

i was sitting down on the sofa/couch watching some cartoons, since there was no ufo documentaries on discovery science, etc.

the tv started freezing, so my first thought as a ufologist, was "maybe theres a ufo out there" and then i started to notice really strange noises which changed for some reason. ive seen several ufos and this was the first non-silent one.

it sounded like a cross between a plane, a helicopter, a tie fighter from star wars, and buzz... and with the combined volume of all these, as it was much louder than either one.

already on my way to the door, i unlocked it and walked out to see what appeared to be just a green glow with a white flashing light. i watched it hover in one direction until it suddenly turned and circled over my house. when it went over my roof, i went back through the house and out to my back garden, where i could see it up close - it was long, black, and either triangular or cigar shaped. with a green light on each side, a smaller dim red light on the back, and a flashing, larger white light in the middle.

i didnt expect it to, but it went around in circles above my house several times for about 25 minutes.

it appeared to be flying in a straight line until i walked out onto the middle of the road and started to record it... it was as if it knew i was watching...
content.summary: Ufo with two green pulsating lights, one white flashing light, and dim red light, circles over my house several times and causes tv to freeze

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing with my son who was blowing bubbles and chasing them and as i watched them blow in the wind noticed a lot of objects blowing around mostly paper and leaves. one object appeared to be a large rectangle of cardboard with retangular cut outs on each corner. i was amazed that such a large object could be picked up and blown that high.  then the rectangle began to shake and move forward into the wind!  i called my son to the side of the house where he could see it and we stood there as this thing hung in one place wobbling up and down. then a opening appeared on the bottom and a black and silver banner fell out of the thing. i was 25 feet from a camera but was so surprised that i never moved toward it. the banner began to twist slowly and after a few minutes the object began to slowly rise.
i was able to follow it up to cloud base (about 15000 ft) by the reflection of the sun off the silver side of the banner.  the object moved very slowly and made no noise of any kind.
we live near the approach to alllentown, bethlehem, easton airport so i called them to tell them this thing was in the approach; they said they had nothing on the scope.
i did report this to a ufo monitoring site but never heard anything back.  i would like to know what this could have been and if anyone else has ever seen such an object?  
i could not begin to guess the size or distance, but; it appeared to be very close to me.
content.summary: Object dropped banner silver/black that rotated and seemed to power ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch looking up when i first noticed what looked like a quick moving single small cloud with no describable shape moving from west to east form into a distinct double vv formation over forest park, il friday oct 1 at around 11pm. as i watched the indescribable mass move above me it formed into a clear low flying double v or vv formation of low lit circle lights. one v was slightly ahead of the other and it silently glided over quickly and disappeared east towards chicago. it looked as if it went from a quick moving low lit cloud to trying to resemble a formation of birds, but i could tell they were not birds because; it made no noise, no out of sequence normal bird bobbing and flapping, it was glowing dimly and remained in perfect formation as the double vv flew over, this all happened in a matter of 10 to 20 seconds. again it looked nothing like normal birds in formation. i would assume if someone happened to look up and see the low lit vv fly over they would probably think they were just geese in formation but i saw it form from a mass of nothing describable to the clear vv. it looked as if the object tried to blend in to fly low over the city by camouflaging itself into that specific shape. i had my camera with me but the event happened so quickly i could only just witness it. since 2009 over forest park i have seen tumbling dark orbs fall from the sky, dark spheres play hide and seek in the clouds, daytime high slow moving star like objects, night time high zig zagging stars, a light reflecting diamond shaped object, a copper colored orb, crescent shaped craft, orange orbs, a red orb, other craft that have resembled birds, and low lit v formations but this is the first time i have seen a low lit quick moving cloud of discoloration form into a double vv formation. all of this is happening over my house with some consistent frequency, i am not sure why its happening but to me it is pretty amazing. below is a generic rendering of what i saw fly over friday october 1, 2010 hopefully someone else saw the same thing i did. peace 


              o             o
    o     o    o           o   
     o   o       o       o
       o           o   o
                     o
content.summary: Double vv formation w/ dim lit lights suddenly appeared then glided away

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of september 30, 2010 i was at snider high school, filming the marching band for a video project i am working on. i was also with my friend. it was around 7:11 pm and as i was filming, a few of the band members point at something in the sky in the distance above the school to the west. the sun was setting in that direction. it was a fairly bright stationary object. i got curious and decided to zoom in all the way on it. let me also point out that i was using a sony handycam dcr-sr42 camcorder with 40x optical zoom and 2000x digital zoom. it was an object with 2 lights and as i watched it the lights would flash green and red over and over. since i was zoomed in all the way, the camera would shake with every tiny motion i took, so i decided to deploy the tripod i was using. as i was messing with they tripod, i tried to draw up an explanation to what the object was, but i drew a blank. after my friend and i fumbled with the tripod we lost sight of the object for just a few seconds until it finally reappeared in a different location in the sky. i zoomed in again and it was the same object. after about a good minute or so the object disappeared. about 2 minutes later we saw another object, but this one i did not video tape, this object was in motion and was flying around in a smooth pattern, staying in the same part of the sky, while that was going on, we witnessed another object appear, but this one was stationary. i turned on the camera and zoomed in. this time it was a single light that was flashing green and red. at this point we had thought that the first single object had split in to 2 separate objects. the object in motion disappear without us realizing it. so we kept watching the stationary object. that object then dimmed out and disappeared. after about 5 min we caught sight of yet again another object. except this one was considerably larger or closer and lower on horizon. i zoomed in on it and right as i did it seemed to grow about twice it size and it glowed red. then it dimmed down and started to move. as i was recording i managed to get some trees in the shot as a reference to track the motion of the object. it moved to the right slowly and as it did, it suddenly stopped. then is started moving again, stopped, moved again, stopped once more and when it started moving it did some kind of loop. it continued to move at a constant speed and got dimmer and brighter as it moved. until finally it disappeared behind the school building. at this point it was 7:30pm and the band's late night rehearsal was ending. the band members who saw it were very puzzled and excited at what they say and watched the videos i had taken. after practice i said goodbye to my girlfriend, and told my friend that was with me to keep his eyes peeled for anything else. at this point the sky was almost completely dark. i got in my car and started driving home, the commute to my house is only 3 minutes since i live in the neighborhood behind the school. with the objects still fresh in my mind i looked up in at the sky hoping to see something and to my amazement i did. i slowed down the car to make sure i was seeing things.  it was an object with 3 lights in a triangle formation traveling southeast towards the school i just came from. it was traveling at a constant speed, and was not very high up, i could not physically see the object since the sky was dark, but as it flew over some stars, the stars disappeared behind the object. there were 2 lights in the front and the light in the back had a white strobe on it. i was about 7:56pm when i saw it. i thought that it might be an aircraft. i looked around and actually saw an usual concentration of air traffic to the west where the first objects were spotted 30 minutes previously. i knew that they we're aircraft because i am quite familiar with the light configuration on conventional aircraft since i am an aviation enthusiast. i can even identify different types of aircraft such as the make and model. i stopped my car in front of someones front yard and started filming. i got in a kneeling position to hold the camera steady and took two videos of the object. i watched it for about two minutes until it disappeared behind the tree line still traveling southeast. freaked out at this point, i called my friend i was with while i drove the rest of the way home through my neighborhood. i told him what i just saw, then he told me that he was still at the school and that he saw a very bright white light in the sky in the same direction the craft was coming from. then it disappeared. i finally got home, very spooked, and watched the videos i had just taken. all of these events took place from approximately 7pm to 8pm. in the same area between my house and snider high school in the neighborhood of glenwood park. there were about 11 to 15 witness on the first objects. and only one or two for the triangular object. the photos attached are frames taken from the videos taken that evening. i am unable to upload the videos since they are to large. the next day i also learned of a sighting of 13 objects exactly like my first sighting in west chicago, illinois on the same day at the exact same time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: 1st object was a sphere shape with flashing green and red light, 2nd object was a triangle with 3 lights

content.detailedDescription: Noticed bright object in northern sky near phoenix around 9:45pm. object flickered red, blue, green. it was stationary, small, far away. saw similar object last spring.
content.summary: Bright colorful pulsating object

content.detailedDescription: At 10:00pm eastern standard time myself and my wife and were walking our two dogs on our favorite walking trail on brandon parkway in brandon, florida. as we were walking by a pond on this trail we heard a splash which startled us as alligators are known to eat dogs, so we are always on guard when walking our dogs near water. the noise wasn't an alligator but only a crane landing in the pond. this scare caused my wife to look up to the right of us which caused her to notice something in the sky. she then asked if i saw what was in the sky. i then looked up and didn't see what she was talking about at first but shortly afterwards i noticed it too. about 30 yards in front of us and 40 feet up in the air was a luminous/shimmering flying object that appeared to be slowly gliding through the air. at first i believed the object was a giant unknown bird however it had no features a bird would have and got more unrecognizable as i stared at it. the object was completely silent and had a slight bend to it looking like a fingernail sliver or the moon in an extremely thin waning gibbous. the object appeared to be anywhere from 10 to 20 feet long. the object was traveling we estimated around 15 to 20 mph. and it flew very smoothly gliding effortlessly through the air. the object was gliding straight past us and then made a twenty degree turn. we slowly watched the object in awe as it slowly flew out of our sight. my wife and i watched the object fly past us in amazement and confusion. the entire sighting lasted from 30 seconds to 1 minute until the craft disappeared from view. at the time we lost sight of the object it was heading west towards tampa. as outlandish as this sounds the object's luminous/shimmering appearance seemed to resemble a "cloaked starship" in star trek or the cloaked predators in the predator movies. it did not have the herky jerky flying motion of a bird or the loud sounds a plane or other recognizable flying craft would make. seeing this defied all logical explanation to my wife and i. it has now been 2 hours since the sighting and i am in awe thinking of what it could have been. i'm reporting this hoping that somebody else out there in hillsborough county, the tampa/st. pete area or anywhere tonight saw this obeject. if anyone else saw this please report it
content.summary: Odd ufo sighting in brandon, florida

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my back porch deck between 9:05pm and 9:25pm smoking a cigarette. i did not have any alcohol in my system, only nicotine and diet coke ... and some cheetos possibly. the night was very clear, no wind, visible stars ... very peaceful outside.

i sat down on my deck chair, and i was looking up eastwards at the sky. i immediately saw, what i thought was a shooting star, going from the north to the south. i have seen a couple of shooting stars before, and they have always gone in a downward motion - and from a great distance. what i saw this night was not that. 

it appeared out of nowhere and then traveled from north to south in about a 30 degree upward motion. it was very quick. and it wasn't "as high" as the stars. it appeared to be around the same distance as a plane would be flying. by this i mean not as high as when planes reach their cruising altitude. the object was around 3/4 of the way up from cruising altitude. but it was definitely not a plane. also, there was absolutely no sound whatsoever. if it had been a plane, i would have heard it ��� even if faintly. and, i would have seen a plane continue on its path. this did not happen at all.

what really threw me through a loop was that it had a vapor trail that appeared a few milliseconds after i saw it shoot upward. the vapor trail appeared ���*almost* at the same time as the object appeared but not quite.
the vapor trail went the same distance as the object and disappeared immediately, as did the object. unlike when i have seen military jets or even passenger planes fly overhead, they emit a vapor trail that stays in the sky for a few seconds to even minutes. this one disappeared immediately.

of the shooting stars i have seen in the past, i never have seen one with a vapor trail. real shooting stars were always so far up in the sky that i wouldn't be able to see a vapor trail if it had one. add to the fact that of the shooting stars i have seen, they last a few seconds longer than this one did. and i could follow their path easily with my eyes. this object, and its trail, came and went almost at the same time ��� it ���popped��� out of now where and then *poof* it was gone.

after i saw this object, i sat there quite stunned. i thought to myself, ���did i just see what i thought i saw? no way! but i saw it. with both eyes wide open. and no one is going to believe me.���  i sat outside, still staring up in the same direction, hoping to see a glimpse of it again. nothing ever came.

i blogged my encounter on facebook and had a couple of friends ���console��� me stating they have seen unexplained objects in the sky before as well.  i was hoping someone in tulsa had also seen what i just saw. no one did, or if they did, they ain���t opening their mouths.

i contemplated just chalking this up as an encounter for just me, myself and i. but i have had this nagging feeling to tell someone who wouldn���t think i am crazy or, more importantly, had other witnesses in tulsa on the same night and time, report a similar sighting.

that���s what i saw, that���s how i felt/feel and that���s my encounter.
content.summary: Looked like shooting star, but went in an upward direction. it had a vapor trail that disappeared almost simultaneously with the object.

content.detailedDescription: At 8pm est my friend and fellow sky watcher called me and said he was going out to watch for a while so i decided to as well. i have a new gen 3 night scope and my old camcorder at about 8:25 i picked the scope up and the first place i pointed it to look through which was facing north looking north east 80 degrees i seen a formation of dull white circles in formation flying from north to south very fast. the first thing that hit me was this is the same thing i have seen before on a famous you tube video i mean a carbon copy of it. from the time i spotted it, till it was gone was around 20 seconds. when i first seen it i stood up to get a better look and so i could follow it south. it was moving very fast, and was not birds, the scope lets you see amazingly clear.
content.summary: Flying formation of circles in shape of an a

content.detailedDescription:
We had stepped out onto our deck at appx 9pm, we live in the mountains in a small bedroom community approx 7500 feet in elevation. we dont have much light pollution and have very good star gazing. as soon as we stepped out looking due north we noticed an extremely bright object with flashing or rotating lights. we viewed this through binoculars, but it was very visable with our bare eyes as well. the object was stationary for at least 10 minutes. we had a ridge and trees to continue to compare with and are very sure it was stationary except for the lights. we called over the neighbor who was able to view it from our deck as well. shortly after that it started to slowly move downward. we were able to follow the downward motion and actually stepped on chairs to continue viewing it until it went out of view behind the ridge.  

this object was much closer that a star would have ever been. it was extremely bright! there didnt appear to have any lights pointiong downward but definitely apeared to have either multiple colored flashing or rotating lights.
content.summary: Bright flashing light, stationary then slowly moved down

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in sheffield, uk and went to my back door for a ciggaret. outside my back door i have a pretty good view east over sheffield toward rotherham. i lit my ciggy and looked over sheffield and about 20 degrees above the horizon i saw a bright light hovering probably about 5 miles away. upon further inspection it looked like 2 bright oval objects very close together. i shouted my girlfriend to come and have a look. she came and saw the object for about 10 seconds, then the objects moved to the left, stoped then seemed to zoom off into the cloud behind it.
content.summary: 2 bright objects

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside waiting on a bus. it was the 12th of september 2010, at exactly 9:48pm. i looked up above the building accross the road from me - and i seen an orange light ascending, as if it just hovered up from the ground. when it got to a certain height, it stopped for a second, then hovered slowly towards me (travelling east) and i managed to get my phone camera set up after 20 seconds or so. i could see the outline of this ship. honestly, it looked exactly like the landing craft from the original series of v. or like the imperial landing craft - or imperial shuttle from star wars. with the square main part, and another part attached to the front - with the 'boost' at the back.. it didnt look like it was a thruster.. was a perfect circle, orange, glowing not exactly like a fire.
(there was also nothing such as smoke emitted from the back)

i recorded this ufo flying but my phone camera just shows the orange light hovering until it disappears. no outline can be noticed in the video.
content.summary: Square shape with seperate section at front (like where you would expect a pilot) with orange glow at back... went overhead and disappeared
